price: Mwenyezi Mungu humkunjulia, na humdhikishia, riziki amtakaye katika waja wake. Kwa hakika Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mjuzi wa kila kitu.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَقۡدِرُ لَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu min ʿibādihi wayaqdiru lahu inna al-laha bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
